summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3706 for the improvement of East 61st Street from 10th Avenue Northeast, to Brooklyn Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45585, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
